data.title: Indoor and Outdoor Electrical/LED Channel Letters, Dimensional/3D
data.meta_description: Pacific Sign Center est 1986 - The premier sign company serving Westminster. Building/business signs, electrical/LED channel letters, dimensional/3D, marquee/monument, vehicle/boat graphics.
data.text:
Pacific Sign Center: Westminster, California's Preferred Sign Company Since 1986

Pacific Sign Center is passionate about signs; from illuminated channel letters, dimensional letter signs, marquees, panel and post signs, and sandblasted/CNC routed signs to magnetic car signs, vinyl banners, vehicle wraps, vinyl car graphics, boat lettering and graphics, and interior signs. All of these signs are fully customizable, competitively priced, and made with the finest materials and craftsmanship. Our exceptional sign services are available to clients throughout Westminster and include planning, design, layout, permitting, manufacturing, and installation. By giving our Westminster clients access to our comprehensive services and some of the most knowledgeable and experienced sign professionals in Southern California, we can consistently deliver signs and service that not only meets our customers' expectations, but exceeds them.

Call Pacific Sign Center today to learn more or to schedule an on-site consultation anywhere in Westminster. Our consultations are free and include a field survey, a review of any sign restrictions and permitting requirements, conceptual draft development, and an upfront estimate.

About Our Sign Making Process

Graphic Design & Layout

Pacific Sign Center gives you access to professional graphic designers who specialize in creating visually powerful signage. They can work with a loose idea or your submitted artwork and specs, and develop it into a layout for your specified sign. Throughout this process, they will make expert recommendations that will improve the look and impact of your sign in the medium and form you have chosen.

Permitting

If you are having us build a sign for your building or other outdoor space in Westminster, your sign may be subject to permitting requirements through the City of Westminster or Orange County. To help facilitate the process, we'll put together a comprehensive permit request package to submit to your landlord for signature (if necessary) and to the appropriate municipality.

Production

Once the final sign layout is approved and we have the necessary sign permits, we will proceed with the production of your sign. Every sign is made with high-quality materials by seasoned sign fabricators.

Installation

Our installation team can be trusted to apply the same level of care and attention to every job they perform, no matter how big or small. They'll perform the job when promised and complete the job in a timely fashion, complying with all safety standards, permitting requirements, and client preferences.

To Obtain Your Free Sign Quote, Call Pacific Sign Center Today: (949) 248-7474

About Our Signs

Sandblasted/CNC Routed Wood and HDU Signs, Westminster, CA

At Pacific Sign Center, we provide Westminster with the best value in sandblasted or CNC routed signs. Our sandblasted signs are beautiful, durable, and reasonably priced. Our Westminster clients can choose to have their sandblasted sign made out of cedar wood or high-density urethane (HDU) depending upon their budget and preferences. Additionally, our clients can opt to add a commercial-grade protective finish and/or hand painting to their sign. Call us today to learn more.

Vinyl Graphics & Wraps for Vehicles, Westminster, CA

Pacific Sign Center provides attractive and long-lasting vehicle graphics/wraps for commercial businesses in Westminster. Our vehicle graphics are made with high-quality vinyl and can be produced in any shape to accommodate cars and trucks of any size. They will draw the attention of those around you and withstand years of wear and tear as you drive around Westminster and beyond. Call us today for a free quote.

Interior Signs, Westminster, CA:

Pacific Sign Center can design, manufacture, and install interior signs for corporate offices, retail stores, and educational facilities that are just as impressive and long lasting as our exterior signs. Our interior signs are fully customizable and can serve a variety of purposes. They've been used to highlight a company's name and logo, feature a menu, commemorate donors, create a unique display, and more. We've created interior signs for nearly three decades and know how to produce high-quality, beautiful interior signs in a timely manner without sacrificing quality. Contact Pacific Sign Center today to learn more about our interior signs.
